unstable_elevate_privileges.description: whether to open unstable elevate privileges

assist_recognition.description: assist recognition, 0: password guess 1: password spraying

is_open_bf.description: Todo: Whether to turn on brute force

flow_control.description: flow control, 1: stealthy 2: intermediate 3: normail 4: noisy

is_detect_ul.description: Whether to detect unstable vulnerabilities, 1: true 0: false

is_filter_wd.description: Whether to filter vulnerable devices, true or false

is_open_ad.description: Whether to detect unstable vulnerabilities, 1: true 0: false

max_connections.description: todo: The maximum number of connections

is_overwrite.description: Overwrite the association between task asset management and manually adding operating system and hostname(0->not overwrite/  1-> overwrite)

scan_port_method.description: scan port method: usual_port all_port custom_port usual_tcp_port

service_analysis_level.description: service analysis level (0 / 7/ 9) -> quick / optinum/ total

use_host_discovery.description: whether use host discovery  True or False

clean_mode.description: clean mode 0--> auto clean 1--> timed clean
